name: ClickerHell
description: Merch a stressful Bullet-Hell with an addictive Click-for-Cash game and YOU will have the time of YOUR life. In "ClickerHell" you shoot enemy's, dodge projectiles and earn money to upgrade your abilities to shoot more enemy's, dodge projectiles and earn money to upgrade your abilities to shoot more enemy's, dodge projectiles and earn money to upgrade your abilities to die. It's a HIGHSCORE game!
